description:
Powered by a single AA battery this lightweight headlamp hits way above its weight class. From a 4 lumen low that is just right for reading after dark, to a trail-illuminating 240 lumens, the HM23 has multiple modes to match your activity. Machined from durable aluminum and sealed against even the heaviest downpour, this compact light is built to last.

  • 3 modes: high (8h at 240 lumens), medium (16h at 70 lumens), low (100h at 4 lumens)
  • Single neutral white Cree LED balances contrast and colour reproduction
  • Powered by a single AA battery, light and easy to find all over the world
  • 1-button operation is easy to use, even in gloves
  • Rugged aluminum housing is tough and helps dissipate heat
  • Silicone headlamp housing offers infinite angle adjustment
  • Perforated, reflective headband wicks away sweat and helps keep you seen
  • IPX6 waterproofing means your light is ready for any weather
  • In the box: HM23, 1 x AA battery, spare battery compartment O-ring, manual and warranty card
name: Fenix HM23 Headlamp
